question: Methanol Economy is being actively pursued by China, Italy, Sweden, Israel, US, Australia, Japan. Consider the following observations about Methanol. 1.Methanol is clean, cheaper than fossil fuels. 2.Methanol is most commonly produced on a commercial scale from natural gas. 3.Although being a high-octane vehicle fuel, methanol offers very low acceleration and power. Which one is/are correct regarding methanol?
explanation: Methanol is a promising fuel as it is clean, cheaper than fossil fuels and a good substitute for heavy fuels. Methanol is a clean-burning fuel that produces fewer smog-causing emissions.
